website_summaries.verdict: The swashbuckler is always a popular Halloween costume choice, and this kit includes pants, shirt, vest, headband, and belt. You may have to buy additional accessories, however.
pros: Well-designed shirt and pants create a "puffy" effect
Very attractive price point for an entire costume
Comfortable to wear for long periods of time
cons: The fit can be larger or roomier than expected

customer_reviews.title: Man Pirate worked out well
customer_reviews.text: Husband wore for family party. Fit as expected, he didn’t complain about being cold (in Kansas evening) but he’s a dude. Bought size Large. He is 220 and 6,2” wears L tops and 33-34 waist. Length wasn’t an issue. His came with wrist cuffs/boot covers and he didn’t wear either. Sword not included. I bought him a sword and eye patch separately. Wore one night so we didn’t want to break the bank here, was a good purchase for price. We wore coordinating costumes from same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pirate costume.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly & arrived the next day. My husband is 5'4 135lbs & ordered a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: It’s meant to be over sized
customer_reviews.text: The straps on the wrist you need some one to help you tie them . It was a great costume for price ! I got so many compliments. The boots are covers but with your own boots they look like they are all one I’m 6.1 and 185 lbs and I got a large fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jesse magana

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but not long lasting quality
customer_reviews.text: I would say it's like most Halloween costume quality. It gets the job done overall for a good price but would be nice to see these made more sturdy. We have already had tearing in the vinyl arm bands and the boot quality is definitely lower than we would have hoped. The belt is really sad I have to say as the buckle part it cheap vinyl that bends when tied and doesn't hold its shape. A plastic buckle would have made a huge difference in quality on that. I don't see this costume lasting for many many wears or anything but for a few times to wear it it's not bad.
customer_reviews.author: T. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - the red dye bleeds!
customer_reviews.text: Costume looks great on, a large was a little loose and sleeves were a little long (use the cuffs to fix this issue), belt is terrible, but otherwise ok. Noticed the next day that ends of the white shirt were tinted pink. Started looking around and found white sheets and pillowcase had pink stains (presumably from headband), white terrycloth stool that I sat on in the pants while putting on boottops was now pink, white towel used to shower after wearing had some pink on it. All stains came out after pre-treatment + bleach in wash, but the red dye is definitely not stable and will stay on your skin unnoticed until you touch something white.
customer_reviews.author: R. Patrick Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't bother with the wrist cuffs they are nearly impossible to use. As well as didn't need the boot covers. It was pretty sweet set up for our Disney Cruise. I have a rocker wig that added to it with a bandana over that. You will get the looks from everyone and I heard a lot of "Man we need to do that next year" Cheap and matched my 3yr olds cheap one too. Score For size. I'm 6'2 190 Lean/Jacked ;) build. ordered the M fit perfect everything. I normally wear L shirts. and 33 pants.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price.  Throw away the belt.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price and looks good, except the belt. The wrist bands don't work very well - difficult to put on by yourself, and then the shirt works its way out in a couple of hours. The belt is ridiculously flimsy and cheap-looking. I'd recommend wearing a real belt instead.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Sedmak

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but runs big
customer_reviews.text: Overall did the job. Have had better quality costumes, but for the price I was pleased. It did run pretty big though. I am an XL in everything, have always been that way.This XL was pretty baggy on me, and the pants I couldn't keep up.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: This costume is AWESOME. It comes with almost everything you need to ...
customer_reviews.text: This costume is AWESOME. It comes with almost everything you need to look like a pirate, and the pants/shirt have a good size (a little bigger than expected, but this is the desired look anyway). Pros: * It comes with almost everything needed to look like a pirate! Shirt, Pants, head piece, wrist cuffs, boots add ons and belt. * It looks really nice. You will look like a real pirate! Contras: * The belt looks cheap and it will probably end up all twisted and in bad shape after sitting down. * The pants can use some suspenders because they don't have any kind of lace to fit in place I would recommend this with my eyes closed!
customer_reviews.author: G P.

customer_reviews.title: Good for one night
customer_reviews.text: This outfit fit wonderfully and I had no issues at all but after about 4 hours of use and one unexpected sprint down the block they held up well until I sat down and they split down the back side seem of the pants. All and all for the price I did not expect them to hold up well but I had hoped for more than one use.
customer_reviews.author: L. John Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Aaargh matey! It's the perfect pirate costume.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great costume for the price! My husband usually wears large and I debated about large or XL. Glad I went with his normal size. It fits perfectly. He is about 5'7" and the pants and shirt fit just right. He may be the only pirate wearing thermal underwear though since our dance is outside. But, really, for the price you can't go wrong with this costume.
customer_reviews.author: D Redding

customer_reviews.title: worked perfectly fine! I still have it for future use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a themed sailing trip in the Caribbean. Light weight to save on luggage costs, worked perfectly fine! I still have it for future use ...
customer_reviews.author: R. Peeler

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Some pieces of the costume didn't even last the whole night. Cheaply made but did its job. I pretty much had to toss the costume by the end of the night. I'm a pretty big guy 5'11" 250 lbs so maybe for someone with a thinner build, it will fit you fine. Otherwise I'll just say, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: N-I-C-K

customer_reviews.title: ... loose but all in all it made for a fine Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: As had been mentioned in the previous reviews the belt (the gold square part) was flimsy and the elastic on the waist was loose but all in all it made for a fine Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Schwab

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect and looked great
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and looked great. I am 5’10 160lbs and a medium fit great. The belt buckle was a bit flimsy so I bent the top and bottom of the buckle back behind the belt, it stayed in place all day and looked good. The material is good quality (the shirt and cuff strings....not so much) and should last years. Very happy with this costume!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Good costume
customer_reviews.text: Good costume - we got a pirate hat to go with it and it really looked great! I had looked at a few my husband, and I’m glad I picked this one. It’s True to size. He wears XL shirts and the XL fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: PARTS OF IT SMELLED AWFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good costume for the price ( i think we paid 20$) but oh my did it have an awful smell! The Pleather parts of the costume (belt wrist band and boot covers) has a very strong fishy odor coming from them and despite my best efforts to wash, freshen and deodorize the smell just kept coming back Also the boot cover elastics broke super easy. I ended up returning it. If you are ok with not using the boot covers, belt, and wrist bands then I say go for it because other then the smell it was a very good price for what you got.
customer_reviews.author: faithispower

customer_reviews.title: Material quality was better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Material quality was better than expected. I am a 34 waist, and wear medium shirts, so ordered the medium size costume - It fits perfectly. Only negative is the flimsy belt buckle. I plan on gluing it to a piece of thin foam board to give it some rigidity. One other down side is the costume is 100% polyester and the label says "Do not wash, dry, or dry clean". So use lots of deodorant and don't sweat a lot, and you might get more than one use out of it. Good value for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: busdriver

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This costume is exactly as advertised. I purchased this to wear at the Gasparilla Parade in Tampa. It held up all day long and looked great. Well worth the price. The material is very thin so i wasnt sure how well it would hold up. I was pleasantly surprised that it survived the long day
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but somethings fishy
customer_reviews.text: It looks really good and high quality(which is surprising for the price). It looks almost too good to wear to college parties because it looks like you put too much time and effort into putting it together. Pretty easy to fix, however, as you can do without the boots/use the headband as a belt/lose the wrist bands. Overall I am very happy with the purchase. There is a small issue of the fake leather smelling like fish. It is not very noticeable if you spray with febreeze or wear cologne but its a little odd. Comes with fake boots, pants, belt, shirt, wrist bands, and headband. Eye patch and sword are not included in the actual costume.
customer_reviews.author: InvestedDuck

customer_reviews.title: Great costume for an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent pirate costume for a Pirate themed float I was on during Mardi Gras. Everyone loved it and it looks better than the price would suspect. If you are in the market for a cheap, yet good quality, pirate outfit than give this one a try. It will get the job done and you will look good doing it too! I am about 5'10 and about 150 pounds and ordered a medium. Probably could have gotten away with a small but those were sold out. The medium wasn't too big on me and worked well with the shoes I wore. Get this costume to save money and have a nice pirate outfit for the day!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap But Works
customer_reviews.text: Costume was great, but you could tell it was on the cheaper end of the spectrum. But hey, it worked great for the one night of use and everybody complimented the costume all night.
customer_reviews.author: Westy

customer_reviews.title: great costume. nice colors
customer_reviews.text: great costume. nice colors. survived 10 hours of wearing it without anything ripping off and stuff. shirt looks best out of all pieces. small cons: *seemed that it was little too big for medium size. *They should put plastic "gold" clamp piece on belt rather than vinyl (it kept banding itself since it was soft) *waistband was little to thin and could be thicker for better support and you not being afraid your pants will just slip down ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Shop-a-holic

customer_reviews.title: It worked but it was cheep
customer_reviews.text: The pants are good, the shirt is ok. The wrist bands were cheep as they could be and were torn in several places just from tying them within an hour of of putting them on. The head tie/band was missing and the belt I didn't bother wearing as it was very flimsy and cheep. I used a blet my wife had.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T Walker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect inexpensive costume
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect inexpensive pirate costume for my husband. It is just thin polyester, but it is great for a pirate party. It does not come with an eye patch or sword, but that didn’t matter to us.
customer_reviews.author: A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: 60 a few days before Halloween and it arrived on time and in great condition. There seems to be some question about ...
customer_reviews.text: Paid $17.60 a few days before Halloween and it arrived on time and in great condition. There seems to be some question about fit; I'm 5'8" 180lbs and the large size fit me fine. Some pieces seem pretty flimsy, so I wouldn't recommend any extra-physical activity. It worked out fine for a night of dinner & drinking. Heck, it may be good for 2016, too!!
customer_reviews.author: jaymez619

customer_reviews.title: fun costume, better quality than expected at low price
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my husband for a halloween party. i was very surprised at the quality since it was so inexpensive. it was not heavy duty or anything but was constructed nicely and well enough to use again next year. it did run a little large. my husband usually wears large men's shirts, so i ordered large but it was a bit big on him. he said the wristlet things bothered him but not to the point he had to take them off. the boot covers were ok. they made the costume seem more complete. it is a good costume and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: hickchick67Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Made my husband look super hot!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband, he is a size 36-371/2 dress shirt and a size 36 in 501 Levi's. The shirt got excellent, right on the money. It made him look quite sexy!! The pant, on the hand for way too large and I just had to take them in a couple inches. The belt is crap, so be ware. The other accessories for the boots and the wrists were more durable and can easily be used as patterns to replicate them out of a higher quality leather like material, or leather if you choose. We bought the xl
customer_reviews.author: Deyanira Aljabali

customer_reviews.title: A bit lower in the quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price .. its good.. has everything needed.. a dollar store visit is still needed for the sword and eye patch though.. The reason for 3 starts is the quality.. Its just tooooo light material.. not sure it it will last for the entire season..we usually have 3-4 events.. Lets see if it survives.. The size is perfect through.. based on amazon sizing guide
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Pass if you want quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking but cheap materials. I didn't even have my costume on for more than an hour before the cuffs started ripping. They were not even tied tighty and couldn't survive the few hours I was wearing the costume. The only stress this costume had was reaching in the fridge and some small walks. Dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is 6 feet tall and 175 pounds, and the Medium size fit well.
customer_reviews.author: LNC_TX

customer_reviews.title: Great pirate costume!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pirate costume. Looks as good as pictured. The boots are genius! Wear them with black shoes to look like boots. Careful note - my husband sat on the bed with the pants on, to put on the boots, and the red came off all over our sheets. It is not colorfast. But the sheets did wash out easily. We didn't wash the costume first. But it fit well and wore well. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall the costume is pretty good. For the price, I did not expect it to look this good. A few minor issues. 1) The strings are not capped so it is hard to get them through the holes 2) Almost impossible to use the wrist pieces. Some attached bungee strings would have been better. 3) In small print, it says no eye patch included yet it is on the packaging image.
customer_reviews.author: adventurelarry

customer_reviews.title: It's AARGH-some!
customer_reviews.text: It's AARGH-some! Much better material than I expected (except for the belt&buckle). I got this to attend FSM church activities (Friday's 5 to 7 PM) and it looks like it will last, and also good enough for ceremonial purposes when I conduct weddings and such. (I am a Reverend of the FSM Church!) The fit is exactly correct also. I got an eye patch/earring combo to go with it, and am all set. Prompt shipping, good packaging, great value for the price....I'm very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: tmexrea

customer_reviews.title: Not all that impressed but it did the job
customer_reviews.text: Fitment was a little bit larger than I anticipated. Comfort level was fairly decent. The arm cuffs were designed for a smaller male size I could barely get them on, and even then it wasn't comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TrishaAnn and Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Quality comparable to cost, which means as long as ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality comparable to cost, which means as long as you don't do Parkour running wearing this costume, it will hold up well. Medium size fits well for size 40 dress shirt size. All cloth and faux leather pieces that come with the package, are delicate but not as delicate as your work place's toilet paper - so should be OK. Get an ear ring and an eye patch from a local party supply store and you will be all set - you may not be the costume winner in the crowd but you won't be the odd one out either.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This costume worked great! My husband is 6'2, 24 lbs and it fit him great. The pants I think are intended to be more like floods, as I read in other reviews. However, the boot covers were more than tall enough to make them look like pants on my husband. It was loose fitting on him as well, not skin tight. High quality for a Halloween costume. We used it for my kids pirate birthday party. Planning on using it for Halloween as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hanns

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for a improvised, last minute Halloween costume. It's comfortable, the polyester fabric is thin and breathable. The boots were kind of hard to put on and as for the belt, I just didn't wear it and took one of my regular large buckle belts. It runs kind of large though, you might want to order a size down. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: mavigo

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick but nothing more.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cheap, not high in quality, but it did the trick. The boot covers and belt should just be thrown away, there's no quality to those at all. Bought it for Pirate Night on a Disney Cruise. So did a ton of other people on the cruise, haha. We were laughing as we would walk down the hallways seeing so many other people wearing the same costume.
customer_reviews.author: Move2theright

customer_reviews.title: Good looking costume
customer_reviews.text: Wore it on Halloween, play bass in a band. The wrist guards didn't work well with the activity of playing an instrument, but probably would be fine if I wasn't that active. The costume looks good, wears well.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Mashl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, cheap
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like anything about this costume. The shirt was kinda ok but the sleeves were huge, I kept getting them caught on everything. The pants wouldn't stay up no matter what I did including putting on a belt, the material was just too slippery. The belt had to be the most cheap thing I have ever seen, I stopped wearing it because it embarrassed me. The boot covers weren't the worst I've ever seen and were by far best part of this costume, although that doesn't mean I liked them, just in comparison to the rest they were good.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Arggh this is a great costume
customer_reviews.text: This outfit fit great. The accessories were perfect. The material is a bit thin but still a great costume for the money that we paid. I would have to say that the best part of the costume were the boot covers. My guy wore them over dress shoes and you could tell that they weren't pirate boots. It was great! The wrist covers were a nice addition to the costume as well. Overall I was very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vbranham

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for 1 Night
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore this on a pirate pub crawl. It works well for 1 night of partying. The wrist pieces kept coming untied, and the belt buckle looks very cheap so he didn't wear the buckle, but overall it was priced well enough for a 1 time wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: A Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and I was looking for a modest costume to wear to work and church for Halloween events. This costume worked great for me! I work a shirt underneath and replaced the belt with something a little better. I gave it 5 stars because I couldn't not have beat the price for a great costume. Only complaint I have is the boot covers were really smelly, but we sprayed them with Fabreze and that helped a lot. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality, fits as expected cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price its a great pirate costume. The quality it's ok. I went to the magic castle halloween party and there was another person with the same costume, so it's pretty popular I guess. I'm 6'2 and I ordered a Large and it fitted as expected. Click the button if this review helped you at all. :)
customer_reviews.author: E&J

customer_reviews.title: the costume is great.
customer_reviews.text: The "boot" parts were damaged. The black stuck together and pulled away the first time it came out of the package. Otherwise, the costume is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Excellent costume
customer_reviews.text: The costume looks great. Ordered Large and it’s true to the size. Pants have elastic waist, shirt is appropriately loose. Boots look almost real. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money - Runs Large in Size - Fish Smell
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing value for the fifteen dollars I spent. I'm 6'2 and 190 lbs. It's perfect for my size (I bought a large based on the reviews) (the shirt is a little big, the pants could be longer but as others have mentioned, the boots cover up the short pants). Yes the fake leather smells like fish, I have mine hanging outside, hopefully the smell will go away. You can't go wrong with this purchase, just don't expect it to last more than 4 times or so .. but even for just one night the cost is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggers in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great for fun, but don't expect it compete in a best costume contest... The quality is pretty junky.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for maybe a one-time use thing, but believe the other reviewers. The boots smell over some wear in the day and the costume as a whole is thin and cheap junk. Fun for an office party, but definitely don't expect to ever compete in any costume contest with this. The pictures always make these products look great. Definitely I would recommend as a cheap option for an office party or something. Overall definitely not up to my standards.
customer_reviews.author: RCZ78

customer_reviews.title: This was a great costume. The wrist wrap things started following apart ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great costume. The wrist wrap things started following apart after a couple of hours of use. We didn't experience the horrible smell that most speak of in their review. My husband is muscular build, 5'10-11, 215 lbs. Shirts are usually Large-XL and pants are 34, 34 and we got the size Large and it fit well.
customer_reviews.author: KirstRob

customer_reviews.title: Costume for Halloween cruise
customer_reviews.text: Bought this costume to wear on our Halloween cruise with Royal Caribbean. Fit perfectly, looked great and I'll definitely be using it again.
customer_reviews.author: DavidH..

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, hubby is happy
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is 5'6", 205 lbs, size 36. We got the costume in Size Large. The shirt and pants were a little loose, but hubby says he'll just put a belt on. Pants is pull up garter. Love the boot covers, looks like leather, unless the felt ones that came with my & the boys' costumes. Only complaint is the stinky chemical smell of the fake leather stuff like the belt, arm cuffs & boot covers, but hopefully it will got away with some airing. Overall, this is a nice costume.
customer_reviews.author: jajack21

customer_reviews.title: As described! Belt was cheaply made .
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my ex bf A bit small on the pants other than the belt being literally a thin piece of paper lol it was awesome it matched my outfit for Halloween and the wrist cuffs brought it all together! I suggest dreadlocks for the headband and some jewelers to tie it all together but other then that as described ! Not dissappointed!
customer_reviews.author: michaela fish

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This costume fit my husband great. He is 5’10 and about 185 pounds. He wore a t shirt and sweatpants underneath because the material is kind of thin. The extra layers helped it not be see thru as well as keeping him warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but cheaply made.  Would I recommend?  Yes.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, but everything was cheaply made. The belt buckle and forearm guards are made out of cheap, thin, flimsy and floppy material. It's almost paper like.
customer_reviews.author: Leviathan The Great Magician of Persia

customer_reviews.title: Best for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Thin but not necessarily cheap material. Exactly what can be expected for this price and will work just fine for dressing up for our kid's enjoyment. I wouldn't spend any more than what we did. Colors and sizing matches description so luckily no surprises there.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend. The pants didn't fit at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't recommend. The pants didn't fit at all, the arm bands were terrible and didn't work, the boot things we're really bad and didn't work. Bad. Bad bad.
customer_reviews.author: lori matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mardi Gras
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, and awesome for photos. Used for Mardi Gras. Would wear again.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the red dye
customer_reviews.text: The costume comes as described, however the red in the black pants bled out of the cloth and turned my legs red, some of the furniture I sat on and it got on my son's legs while I was holding him and now it is on our stroller and car seat. Not happy with the product. We did not wash or get them wet. I put them on right out of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hilsdorf

customer_reviews.title: Okay costume
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one for my husband.. we were happy with it for the price we have paid. Needless to say that it is not high quality but it is ok for Halloween when you have to wear it for a day only.. Eye patch and the sword in the picture is not included... i am looking in local stores (target, partycity)to get those... Belt in the middle is junk..actually it is just a piece of cloth..you can add your own belt! Its little big... so order your true size.. All in all its a good costume...
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive consume that needs some work
customer_reviews.text: Decent costume for the price. The big problem with this costume is that the belt buckle part of it is not stiff at all and looks like crap. I had to use some cardboard and tape it behind the face buckle in order to keep it from just folding over. The bracers are a pain to put on though too, but they actually look good.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brookes

customer_reviews.title: Pirate Costume for Men
customer_reviews.text: Great for our pirate themed night on our Disney Cruise getaway! He did order a size up and I’m glad that he did. Looked great and fun to wear!
customer_reviews.author: SC Perks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Only complaint is that the leather sleeves kept coming undone because the fit wasn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: This costume worked out great for me...I'm 6'4" and 220 lbs...so I ordered XL. The belt buckle was the only thing that looked cheaply made. Over all this was above my expectations for full costume at this price. I added a captains hat to complete the look I wanted and got a great response. I lost count of how many people asked to take pictures with me while celebrating the 300th year of Black Beard at Ocracoke island.
customer_reviews.author: todd herring

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Able to use it year after year.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: good fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a party and wanted a reasonable costing costume without cheaping out. I am 6' and 180 pounds, a very medium build and this costume fit well. Wore the pants over some jeans and a t-shirt under the shirt as the costume is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this costume for Halloween, and I really liked it. Most of the costume is made up of pretty decent material, but one of my wrist bracers tore after wearing for one night. Not a big enough tear to make it not functional, but big enough for you to notice. Overall pretty good costume though.
customer_reviews.author: William Penn

customer_reviews.title: Great value - good quality Pirate costume
customer_reviews.text: Size charts in the description is perfect. I bought an XL and it was perfect. Decent quality costume that held up all night and I have no doubt would work for several more parties. Excellent value and it really does come out looking like the picture...even if you have more 'padding' than the model
customer_reviews.author: Joe M

customer_reviews.title: but the shirt is nice, the pants are good
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it and wore it to a party the other day. The belt is the cheapest looking part, but the shirt is nice, the pants are good, the wristbands an unexpected touch. The belt needs upgrading. But the whole thing is a good look, and we jus left the belt off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes the belt is poor hoever it is a costume and it can be ...
customer_reviews.text: This costume came exactly as described. Yes the belt is poor however it is a costume and it can be fixed. The rest of the costume will be perfect for Pirates day at the Renaissance Fair! And it came earlier than expected! Yay so happy with my purchase. Thank you great job! The plastic does have a smell but I've had it hanging up since I got it and it's aired out just fine. It fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lyn

customer_reviews.title: great pirate costume
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pirate costume to match with my girlfriend. This one was perfect. It fit great, I got a M which is where I should be. The material is pretty good for a halloween costume. The pants are short, but they supposed to be since you get the boot covers. I like the arm bracers, it's a nice touch. It doesn't come with a sword or eye patch but even without those it still looks like a pirate costume. Overall, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jeeves

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery good quality Costume material
customer_reviews.text: Product came the next day just as the order said. Its very good quality flour a Halloween costume. Would have given a whole 5 stars if there seam down the leg was completely sewn. There is about a 2 inch hole i will have to sew where the fabric slipped during manufacturing (It's NOT a rip). Its not a big deal at all.
customer_reviews.author: CaliKye Littmann

customer_reviews.title: A bit cheesy
customer_reviews.text: It fits ok and the quality is average but it's kinda cheesy-looking in person. My husband won't wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie E

customer_reviews.title: pirate costume
customer_reviews.text: This costume worked great as our pirate captain prop on our haunted pirate ship. Just added skeleton gloves and pirate scarf with dread and mask and voila really cool pirate prop. After making huge gator and octopus props I wanted something easy to make. These costumes were perfect. They held up to strong winds and rain too. And they are still in great shape to use next year.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, good quality, everything you need to be a pirate!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price. Cute costume. Everything you need to be a pirate!! My husband gots of compliments on this costume. The pants didn't last long, but everything else has lasted a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Great costume. I bought this for my husband, who loves to shop for costumes but never finds anything he wants. This one fit great. The colors were bright and even the shoe covers were good! He loved wearing it. Will buy costumes from California Costumes again!
customer_reviews.author: D P.

customer_reviews.title: Size up!
customer_reviews.text: This runs extremely small! My husband isn’t a large man and it was still small! Size up!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Extremely cheap material
customer_reviews.text: The costume looks very good, but it is incredibly cheaply made. I wore it one day to a pirate parade in Tampa, and I had to throw it away after that. As soon as I went to put it on, the material was falling apart on me. The laces on the cuffs broke off, and the straps on the pants came off. There was no way to tighten the pants and they kept falling down. There are also no pockets at all, so someone else had to hold my wallet and keys for me.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: In fact I was more satisfied than expected
customer_reviews.text: This worked out exactly as I hoped. In fact I was more satisfied than expected. Fit just right, I am 5'8 and am 170lbs and the medium was perfect. It was also a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Mazzola

customer_reviews.title: This costume is a great bang for the buck product
customer_reviews.text: This costume is a great bang for the buck product, but don't anticipate the belt and cuffs to make a second go round. Actually, the belt is so cheap you will tape it up so you can tell what it is, and eventually you will get tired of messing with it and through it away. Either way it fits properly and with a wig I got a lot of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: No complaints with this costume. Got it last minute, it fit and it was a hit. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Steve Danke

customer_reviews.title: Aye matey!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little thin, which is unfortunate on a chilly October night, but no complaints beyond that. I wore this last Halloween and I loved it
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Upcoming Disney Cruise pirate night
customer_reviews.text: The medium fit my 5'11" 190# husband perfectly and he looks fantastic in it to boot!
customer_reviews.author: Denise S.

customer_reviews.title: 17yr old son is 5’10” and weighs about 175. ...
customer_reviews.text: 17yr old son is 5’10” and weighs about 175. Ordered medium and it fits a little loose but will still work well.
customer_reviews.author: LGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Costume was ok looking but had some issues The plastic parts STUNK! They had a weird fish smell; wasn't so strong that people noticed but still... The pants kept falling off, some kind of belt loop inside would be good. Other reviewers are right, the included belt is just for show. Good costume for the price, add in some makeup and some jewelry and you will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money belt buckle is cheap and ...
customer_reviews.text: pants have strings but mine wouldn't adjust. good value for the money belt buckle is cheap and floppy . Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Davy

customer_reviews.title: But donated to a local charity and given to a poor child who cried with thanks for his first real ...
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Accepted for free return, thanks to Amazon. But donated to a local charity and given to a poor child who cried with thanks for his first real costume. So maybe it deserves lots of stars!
customer_reviews.author: E. Caroe

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It's a cheap costume, which I expected so it did its job. I did receive three boot covers, but wasn't short on anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: ... have in mind that the material is not the best
customer_reviews.text: make sure to get a size bigger than your size and have in mind that the material is not the best quality
customer_reviews.author: ACRE

customer_reviews.title: it was nice, the wrist bands were leathery type material
customer_reviews.text: actually was expecting it look cheaper than it was. it was nice, the wrist bands were leathery type material, everything was good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: From a woman's perspective
customer_reviews.text: I am a female that ordered the men's medium. I typically wear a large in women's but I like things to fit loosely and as this certainly runs big, even with hips, this costume was forgiving! For the price, you can't beat it!! I was in the league of better costumes at work and many of those people had spent six to seven times (or more) than what I did. Coupled with a hook, hat and some eyeliner, I made a very convincing Captain Hook. The only thing cheesy was the belt which was cheap and looked lousy as I do have hips. I just took it off and went without it. :0) awesome awesome costume.
customer_reviews.author: K. Nannini

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Costume for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This pirate costume is so authentic and genuine that no one believed the price I paid. It is exactly as shown and very durable. I have a 40" Chest and the large fit with room to spare. The eye patch and sword do not come with the outfit but those are easy items to add. I chose this for an adult party I was attending and it was a hit. I highly recommend this product to everyone and I am sure you will not be disappointed:)
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: Great outfit for the price and fit
customer_reviews.text: Was a great outfit for the price! Ordered an XL and it fit as expected
customer_reviews.author: okaren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small fit true to small or extra small male size. Used an extra skull bandana to complete it
customer_reviews.author: Samnam

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a costumer party. The white shirt could be switched out with a nicer one as it is super thin and under detailed. Fit is smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Urban

customer_reviews.title: Great fabric also price great compared to store
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied., my husband is very hard to plz and fortunate for me it came right on time. He's super handsome in his pirate outfit we matched and it was amazing. Hes 5'6" he has a beer belly and we ordered a XL. He said it was comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Anika

customer_reviews.title: Nice but smelly
customer_reviews.text: It is such a nice costume, so excited to have my husband wear it, but then we open the bag where the belt, cuffs and boot covers where in and the smelled killed us. The rubber smelled like fish and he could not wear them. The shirt, pants and head band is great.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Charnetzky

customer_reviews.title: Good costume for the price but needs better laces.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good costume for the price. I upgraded the laces with real leather shoe strings because the ones it comes with are basically worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Justin McGarry

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad considering the price
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad considering the price. The costume is large for me, but I can make it work. The only issue is that the pants are fading. There is red dye on everything I touch. I won't be able to wear the pants because if I happened to brush up against a light piece of furniture or other costume, I would definitely leave a mark. However, I think they can be switched out with black jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Akatl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fun, arrrrr.
customer_reviews.text: My costume arrived overnight, and it was pretty fun pulling it out of the package. Everything was included as described. The belt is super cheapo, so I'll probably ditch it, and I'm going to have to figure out how to keep the pants up...the elastic waist band is a little loose on me. Overall, well worth the $20 investment for an instant overnight costume.
customer_reviews.author: Ithaca LA

product_meta.title: Adult Sized Cutthroat Pirate Costume
product_meta.description: Costume includes shirt with front lacing detail, pants, head tie, boot tops, belt and wrist cuffs.
